name: Magnet Forensics
title: Software Developer
description: Contributed to Magnet AXIOM, a digital forensics platform, by resolving bugs, writing unit tests, and ensuring the platform's reliability. Automated the generation of technical artifacts, including API documentation and metadata files, to streamline workflows and improve developer efficiency.

name: Miovision
title: Full-stack Developer
description: Worked on Miovision One, a cloud-based traffic management platform that is used in over 17,000 municipalities over 50 countries. Collaborated in an Agile environment using Jira to manage sprints.

name: BlueStreak Electronics
title: Software Developer and Database Developer
description: Designed and maintained REST APIs and a secure web interface to manage a large-scale auto parts database. Refactored data pipelines and implemented tools to support complex business logic and improve data management.

name: P&P Data Systems
title: Software Developer Intern
description: Developed software applications and optimized databases for clinical information systems. Built data pipelines to streamline the transformation and integration of healthcare records.
